overview: Mona Wales is in trouble, but luckily she has already planned to stay at her friend's home, and it's the perfect opportunity to sort her troubles back home. Mona Wales friend, Susan, isn't answering her phone, but Mona decides to visit anyway. When she arrives she meets a stranger in Susan's house, Zac Wild, she immediately feels uneasy about him, but there is something entrancing about him. Watch the story unfold..
title: The Gentleman
